text:
直到好幾天之後，那些網友們不再爭吵，[redacted_name]和[redacted_name]兩人的話題熱度漸漸掉下去的時候，某個深夜裡，一段視頻被爆了出來。
那是[redacted_name]讓經紀人發出去的視頻。
裡面記載了他和[redacted_name]之前，兩人平時相處的樣子，兩人一起出去逛街，吃火鍋，吃大排檔，吃法國料理……等等等等，各種兩人私底下相處的模樣。
還有兩人在國外拍攝MV時的樣子，裡面有外國街道和洋人做裝飾，還有美麗的教堂之類的環境做陪襯。
還有兩人在飛機上，相互依偎著閉眼睡覺時的模樣。
trans:
It was not until several days later, when the netizens stopped quarreling and attention on the topic of [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] gradually faded, a video was released late one night.
That's the video that [redacted_name] had his agent send out.
It records how he and [redacted_name] usually got along before, with all kinds of private interactions between the two of them like going shopping together, going for hot pot, food stalls, French cuisine, and so on,
There are also scenes of the two of them filming an MV abroad, with foreign streets and foreigners in the background, and beautiful churches and other environments as backdrops.
There are also the two on the plane, cuddling with each other with their eyes closed in their sleep.
